availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, tailor. Pennsylvania native. Married to Ellen Knight Kelly in Mason County on October 10, 1850. Father of Laura Kelly and Frank L. Kelly. Tailor in Mason County in 1850. Tailor in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 3, p. 154A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Mays Lick, p. 57.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Germantown, p. 371A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, 1796-1946, Film #000281843, p. 371 of 515 of microfilm.
